query.formula:
E[] ( ( not PB1R.B1RG | (not PC2S.C2SG && not PC2R.C2RG)) &&
( not PB3R.B3RG | (not PC4S.C4SG && not PC4R.C4RG)) &&
( not PB2R.B2RG | (not PC1S.C1SG && not PC1R.C1RG)) &&
( not PB4R.B4RG | (not PC3S.C3SG && not PC3R.C3RG)) )
query.comment: S7.5 (conditions when Bir turns green): (i) green lights of Bir and Cjs and (ii) green lights of Bir and Cjr

query.formula:
E[] ( (not PB1S.B1SG | (not PC2R.C2RG && not PB2L.B2LG)) &&
(not PB3S.B3SG | (not PC4R.C4RG && not PB4L.B4LG)) &&
(not PB2S.B2SG | (not PC1R.C1RG && not PB1L.B1LG)) &&
(not PB4S.B4SG | (not PC3R.C3RG && not PB3L.B3LG)) )
query.comment: S7.4 (conditions when Bis turns green): (i) green lights of Bis and Cjr and (ii) green lights of Bis and Bjl

query.formula:
E[]((not PB3L.B3LG | (not PC4R.C4RG && not PB4S.B4SG && not PB4L.B4LG)) &&
(not PB2L.B2LG | (not PC1R.C1RG && not PB1S.B1SG && not PB1L.B1LG)) &&
(not PB4L.B4LG | (not PC3R.C3RG && not PB3S.B3SG && not PB3L.B3LG)) )
query.comment: S7.3 (conditions when Bil turns green): (i) green lights of Bil and Cjr, (ii) green lights of Bil and Bjs, and (iii) green lights of Bil and Bjl

query.formula:
E[] ( (not PC1R.C1RG | (not PC2R.C2RG && not PC2S.C2SG && not PB2R.B2RG && not PB2S.B2SG && not PB2L.B2LG)) &&
(not PC3R.C3RG | (not PC4R.C4RG && not PC4S.C4SG && not PB4R.B4RG && not PB4S.B4SG && not PB4L.B4LG)) &&
(not PC2R.C2RG | (not PC1R.C1RG && not PC1S.C1SG && not PB1R.B1RG && not PB1S.B1SG && not PB1L.B1LG)) &&
(not PC4R.C4RG | (not PC3R.C3RG && not PC3S.C3SG && not PB3R.B3RG && not PB3S.B3SG && not PB3L.B3LG)) )
query.comment: S7.2 (conditions when Cir turns green): (i) green lights of Cir and Cjr, (ii) green lights of Cir and Cjs, (iii) green lights of Cir and Bjr, (iv) green lights of Cir and Bjs, and (v) green lights of Cir and Bjl

query.formula:
E[] ( (not PC1S.C1SG | (not PC2R.C2RG && not PB2R.B2RG)) &&
(not PC3S.C3SG | (not PC4R.C4RG && not PB4R.B4RG)) &&
(not PC2S.C2SG | (not PC1R.C1RG && not PB1R.B1RG)) &&
(not PC4S.C4SG | (not PC3R.C3RG && not PB3R.B3RG)))
query.comment: S7.1 (conditions when Cis turns green): (i) green lights of Cis and Cjr and (ii) green lights of Cis and Bjr

query.formula: E[] ( not (PB1R.B1RG && PC3R.C3RG) && not (PB3R.B3RG && PC2R.C2RG) && not (PB2R.B2RG && PC4R.C4RG) && not (PB4R.B4RG && PC1R.C1RG) )
query.comment: S6.5 (conditions when Bir turns green): green lights of Bir and Cjr must not occur concurrently.

query.formula:
E[] ( (not PB1S.B1SG | (not PC3S.C3SG && not PC3R.C3RG && not PB3S.B3SG)) &&
(not PB3S.B3SG | (not PC2S.C2SG && not PC2R.C2RG && not PB2S.B2SG)) &&
(not PB2S.B2SG | (not PC4S.C4SG && not PC4R.C4RG && not PB4S.B4SG)) &&
(not PB4S.B4SG | (not PC1S.C1SG && not PC1R.C1RG && not PB1S.B1SG)))
query.comment: --S6.4 (conditions when Bis turns green): (i) green lights of Bis and Cjs, (ii) green lights of Bis and Cjr, and (iii) green lights of Bis and Bjs

query.formula:
E[] ( (not PB1L.B1LG |(not PB3S.B3SG && not PB3L.B3LG)) &&
(not PB3L.B3LG | (not PB2S.B2SG && not PB2L.B2LG)) &&
(not PB2L.B2LG | (not PB4S.B4SG && not PB4L.B4LG)) &&
(not PB4L.B4LG | (not PB1S.B1SG && not PB1L.B1LG)) )
query.comment: S6.3 (conditions when Bil turns green): (i) green lights of Bil and Bjs and (ii) green lights of Bil and Bjl.

query.formula:
E[] ( (not PC1R.C1RG | (not PC3R.C3RG && not PB3R.B3RG && not PB3S.B3SG && not PB3L.B3LG)) &&
(not PC3R.C3RG | (not PC2R.C2RG && not PB2R.B2RG && not PB2S.B2SG && not PB2L.B2LG)) &&
(not PC2R.C2RG | (not PC4R.C4RG && not PB4R.B4RG && not PB4S.B4SG && not PB4L.B4LG)) &&
(not PC4R.C4RG | (not PC1R.C1RG && not PB1R.B1RG && not PB1S.B1SG && not PB1L.B1LG)) )
query.comment:
-- S6.2 (conditions when Cir turns green):
-- (i) green lights of Cir and Cjr, (ii) green lights of Cir and Bjr, (iii) green lights of Cir and Bjs, and (iv) green lights of Cir and Bjl

query.formula:
E[] ( (not PC1S.C1SG | (not PC3S.C3SG && not PC3R.C3RG && not PB3R.B3RG && not PB3S.B3SG && not PB3L.B3LG)) &&
(not PC3S.C3SG | (not PC2S.C2SG && not PC2R.C2RG && not PB2R.B2RG && not PB2S.B2SG && not PB2L.B2LG)) &&
(not PC2S.C2SG | (not PC4S.C4SG && not PC4R.C4RG && not PB4R.B4RG && not PB4S.B4SG && not PB4L.B4LG)) &&
(not PC4S.C4SG | (not PC1S.C1SG && not PC1R.C1RG && not PB1R.B1RG && not PB1S.B1SG && not PB1L.B1LG)) )
query.comment:
S6.1 (conditions when Cis turns green):
-- (i) green lights of Cis and Cjs, (ii) green lights of Cis and Cjr, (iii) green lights of Cis and Bjr, -- (iv) green lights of Cis and Bjs, and (v) green lights of Cis and Bjl

query.formula: E[] (not (PC1S.C1SG && PB1L.B1LG) && not (PC1R.C1RG && PB1L.B1LG) && not (PC1R.C1RG && PB1S.B1SG) && not (PC2S.C2SG && PB2L.B2LG) && not(PC2R.C2RG && PB2L.B2LG) && not(PC2R.C2RG && PB2S.B2SG) && not (PC3S.C3SG && PB3L.B3LG) && not(PC3R.C3RG && PB3L.B3LG) && not(PC3R.C3RG && PB3S.B3SG) && not(PC4S.C4SG && PB4L.B4LG) && not(PC4R.C4RG && PB4L.B4LG) && not(PC4R.C4RG && PB4S.B4SG) )
query.comment: -- S5: each pair of the following green lights must not occur concurrently: -- (i) green lights of Cis and Bil, (ii) green lights of Cir and Bil, and (iii) green lights of Cir and Bis
